info.title: tailf-kicker Event Notifications
info.description:
This module contains YANG definitions for Tail-f kicker event notifications.

**Event Notifications Module** - Used for model-driven telemetry and streaming subscriptions.

**Usage**: Subscribe to events via NETCONF/RESTCONF subscriptions

**Protocol**: RFC 8639 (Subscription to YANG Notifications)

**Authentication**: HTTP Basic Authentication

**YANG Model:** [tailf-kicker.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/tailf-kicker.yang)

**ðŸŒ³ YANG Tree:** [View tailf-kicker structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/tailf-kicker.html)

get.description: Notification when a kicker is triggered by monitored data changes

kicker-id.description: Identifier of the kicker that was triggered

path.description: Path to the monitored node that triggered the kicker
